summary: When a man answers an advertisement to train as a record producer, he's excited by the prospect of signing undiscovered musicians, only to discover his new job isn't all it's cracked up to be.
cast: Pat Healy|Kene Holiday|John Baker|Robert Longstreet|Tyler Baum|Matt Chapman|Brent Dunn|Frances Green|James Green|Libertad Green|Michael Harding|Barlow Jacobs|Carver Johns|Rebecca Mader|Missy Palmer|Tricia Paoluccio|Tim Parati|Scott C. Reynolds|Laura Rikard|Mark Scarboro|Justin St. Gelais|Renee St. Gelais|Collette Wolfe|Keisha Ramdhanie|Kellie Ramdhanie
title: Great World of Sound
